summary: Americans on vacation in the Caribbean take a tour of a nearby island at night and watch a local voodoo ritual. Soon after, they find themselves stranded on the island and under attack by unseen foes. One by one they meet violent ends.
cast: David Broadnax|Rita Jenrette|Tom Cantrell|Diane Clayre Holub|George Peters|Ian McMillan|Dennis Stephenson|Debbie Ewing|Kristina Marie Wetzel|Harriet Rawlings|Christopher Ferris|Ralph Monaco|Deborah Jason|Tom Fitzsimmons|Bruce Sterman|Luba Pincus|Emmett Murphy|Trevor Reid|Mignon Lowe|Oscar Lawson
keywords: caribbean sea|grindhouse film|psychotronic film|caribbean island|female nudity
director: Director: John Carter (as John N. Carter)
title: Masacre en la isla de los zombies
